name: Asteroid Odyssey 2177
description: Asteroid Odyssey brings the best features of some of the classic arcade space shooter games and adds some great twists.  One of your missions consists of destroying targets, where your goal is to defend the earth's satellites against asteroids and space pirate ships.  To do this, you will have access to some of the neatest special weapons ever conceived.  Another mission consists of guiding a satellite through an obstacle course of asteroids, while trying to build starships and accomplish other tasks.
